summary: I WAS SLOWING DOWN TO TURN RIGHT AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT AND WHEN I WENT TO EXCELERATE  THE CAR STALLED AND IT CAME TO AN ABRUPT STOP.  IT STARTED UP RIGHT AWAY BUT IT SCARED ME. IT WASN'T THAT HOT. IT WAS AROUND 10:00 PM IN LAS VEGAS AT THE END OF MAY 2017. IT HAPPENED ONCE BEFORE THAT BUT I DON'T REMEMBER THE DATE.
